metadata.name: Suspicious Msbuild Execution By Uncommon Parent Process
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious execution of 'Msbuild.exe' by a uncommon parent process

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msbuild.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('msbuild.exe') AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\devenv.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\msbuild.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\python.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\explorer.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\nuget.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious execution of 'Msbuild.exe' by a uncommon parent process
